medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Friends Visiting in the Mountains
marks: Signature and Seal center R: [ 九露山樵 ]
description: mountain range at top with trees; shorter mountain with huts center R; rocky outcropping at LL with large trees; rocks at bottom with two figures hiking; arched stone bridge at R; trees and foliage throughout; trees highlighted with light green; tree trunks and rocks highlighted with light brown
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Col. Peter and Mrs Betty Peabody
